entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow early this afternoon with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023
